DOC.brief_summary: Phase IV , prospective multicenter , observational Registry track cycle outcomes subject thaw frozen oocyte subsequent use vitro fertilization ( IVF ) embryo transfer ( ET )
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects enrol many ART clinic offer oocyte cryopreservation willing participate Registry . Oocytes retrieve cryopreserved autologous heterologous donor . When subject decides would like get pregnant , oocytes thaw , fertilize resultant embryo transfer oocyte donor ( autologous use ) another recipient ( heterologous use ) . The treatment regimen complete births well-baby follow-up child 12 month age . Information child submit parent Investigators . Data collection Registry active maximum five ( 5 ) year , include three ( 3 ) year enrollment two ( 2 ) additional year complete well-baby follow-up child .
DOC.criteria: Must ART program Donor recipient must reproductive age ( 1850 year old , inclusive time oocyte freeze and/or thaw ) intend achieve pregnancy utilize frozen thaw autologous heterologous oocyte Female partner ( applicable ) must voluntarily provide write informed consent/HIPAA authorization prior Registryrelated data collection Female partner ( applicable ) must willing provide second write informed consent follow live birth prior Registry relate data collection birth characteristic twelve ( 12 ) month evaluation offspring Children born woman take part registry birth 12 month ( +/ 1 month ) age Have clinically significant systemic disease Have abnormal , undiagnosed gynecological bleeding Have contraindication Controlled Ovarian Stimulation ( COS ) ART gonadotropin use ART Also , rare situation , undergo ET mixed embryos generate fresh oocyte produce current cycle well frozen embryo generate nonfrozen oocyte obtain previous ART cycle Children born woman take part Registry Any offspring woman Registry subject take part registry
